Key: Huh? Yoshino?
Shido-san...

You're watching TV?
Huh, that's unusual.

I thought I should... study this world properly...
So I borrowed... a video... from Kotori-san...

Huh, that's admirable, Yoshino. It's a good thing
to want to improve yourself. So, what show
are you watching?
Goodness... you're ridiculous, big brother...
Wha—?!
B-But... if you really want me to,\nbig brother, then...

Whoa! Wait, wait!!
Isn't this bad?!
I-Is it...?
Ah, er... Well, you see...
Hoo-whee～ It was just about to get good.\nYou won't stop us just before, right Shido-kun?

No, no, I'm stopping it.
Sorry, but wait just a moment!
What's with all the yelling?

K-Kotori, you... This video isn't good at all for
young minds!
It's easier to watch if it's anime, right? For\nfast and potent learning about love and romance,\nthere's no deeper teacher, wouldn't you say?

This is too deep! Don't you have
anything more normal?
You're kidding, right? You like it,\ndon't you Shido?

Well, it's not like I don't... No, that's not
important! Either way, I think it's way
too extreme a sample...
But Yoshino has to live normally in this world,\nso don't you think she has a need to understand\nthese sorts of things as well?
No, wait. That reasoning's all weird.
What? Well, it's not like I want to force it,\nso do whatever you want, Shido.
Rrrrgh... I-I...
Allow her to watch.
Take the video away.

...It seems like she's curious about what happens
next, so this time I'll let it go.

Yoshino, if we see something not good, I'm
going to stop it, all right?
Okay. I'll leave it... to you, Shido-san.
Goodness～! You like this too, huh Shido-kun?
...All right, bring it on!
Big brother... Are you cold?\nIs it okay if I scooch closer...?
Um... big brother?\nIs it okay... if we get in the bath together...?
Big brother... I'm scared all alone...\nIs it okay, if I get in bed with you...?

(The dialogue from earlier made me imagine some
sort of forbidden love... but it was surprisingly
tame.)

It's over... Well, it was pretty interesting for
a romance movie.
U-Um... Shido-san...
Hm? What's wrong?

U-Umm... Did Kotori-san... also,
do these sort of... um...

Ohh... Well, in the past I guess there were some
similarities... She would always cling to
me and stuff.
I-I see...

Now, she's totally different, so it doesn't happen
anymore.
I... see...
Hmm... what's wrong?
Ahh, too bad, Shido-kun! It really was a little\nbit too strong of a shock for Yoshino, it seems!
Oh, Yoshino...

N-No, it's not good!
This is too early for you, Yoshino!!
Oh...
Aaaah, it was just about to get good!\nYou're such a meanie, Shido-kun!

N-No matter what you say, what's bad is bad! This
sort of show is like, you know... Something you
watch after you learn adult common sense and...
...You all right there, Shido?\nAre you confusing yourself?
Sh-Shut up...

Either way... Yoshino, you don't have to rush
into becoming an adult. I'll be watching over
you, so...
Shido-san...
*Whistle* Not bad, Shido-kun. How manly!

For now, I'll return this video to Kotori.
Don't get fooled by bad senpais, all right...?
...Okay.
Who's a bad senpai? Don't forget\nthis moment so easily.
Wait, Kotori?! Ah, now I've done it.
